name: Nothing Lasts Forever
text: Give to the Cassie Lang player. You may flip to alter-ego form. Choose: • Summon Iron Lad → remove him and this obligation from the game. • You cannot be in [[Giant]] or [[Tiny]] hero form until the next villain phase. Discard this card.

name: Growing Man
text: [star] Growing Man cannot take more than 1 damage from each instance of damage and his ATK is equal to his remaining hit points. When Defeated: Remove Growing Man from the game. (Stature's nemesis minion.)

name: Something is Off...
text: Forced Response: After Growing Man takes damage from a player, summon a copy of Growing Man (Clone) and put it into play engaged with that player. Forced Response: After Growing Man is defeated, remove this side scheme from the game.

name: Growing Man (Clone)
text: [star] Growing Man (Clone) cannot be attacked and his ATK and hit points are equal to Growing Man's remaining hit points. When Defeated: Remove this card from the game.
